moreBlocks.articles:
• Personal Injury Protection (PIP)
    It makes more sense to think about PIP insurance as health insurance, rather than automobile insurance. PIP is insurance that pays your medical bills like health insurance when you are hurt in an automobile accident.
  • Automobile Accident
    We can quickly analyze your insurance coverage and the insurance coverage of the person who caused the accident and let you know what your options are.
  • Medical Malpractice & Nursing Home Neglect
    Whether it’s in a hospital or a nursing home, we all have a right to expect the best from those we entrust with our care.
  • Product Liability
    If you are seriously injured by a product, it is worth looking at the design, the manufacture, the instructions and warning that came with the product to see if your injury could have been prevented.
  • Premises Liability
    Any place that is open to the public has a responsibility to maintain that establishment in a safe and clean condition. When an establishment fails to do so, they can be held responsible for injuries that occur as a result of their negligence.

description:
Serving all of Florida, The Pendas Law Firm is a personal injury and insurance law firm with offices in Jacksonville, Orlando, Daytona Beach, Tampa, Bradenton, Ft. Myers, West Palm Beach, Fort Lauderdale, and Miami. Founded in 2004 by attorneys who came to The Pendas Law Firm with decades of trial experience behind them, our firm has grown to include a full team of trial lawyers qualified to assist you in your legal concerns.

Our trial lawyers, legal assistants, paralegals and support staff are fluent in Spanish and English, and we provide bilingual legal services to individuals and families who need skilled representation to resolve matters involving medical malpractice, nursing home negligence, premises liability, car accidents, product liability and related personal injury and insurance claims.

The Pendas Law Firm has successfully recovered significant sums in settlements and verdicts for our clients, often meeting policy limits for the fullest reward possible. If you or a loved one is struggling financially, emotionally and physically to make ends meet because of an accident or injury that was not your fault, please visit one of our five office locations for assistance. You have rights, and there is legal recourse available to you. Discuss your options with one of our committed attorneys and learn more about how we can be of service to you.

Your initial consultation is free, and you will not be billed for our services unless we successfully recover damages on your behalf. The Pendas Law Firm offers compassionate and affordable representation proven to deliver results for those in need. To discuss a personal injury, serious accident or negligent act requiring legal action, call our firm to schedule a consultation.
